channel.title: CosmWasm by Example
channel.description: Recent content on CosmWasm by Example

item.title: Contributing to this website
item.description: Repository to contribute in: (abhinavmir/cosmwasm-by-example)[https://github.com/AbhinavMir/cosmwasm-by-example] The website aims to be open source and quick to launch. We use Hugo { is super easy to install! } to generate the website. The website is deployed via Vercel from the build repository. To see open issues, head over to issues and filter by tag. Refer to the template here. Here is how you contribute, clone the repository and create a file in contents/post with the following sections at minimum: content.
